item.description:
**RSVPs are closed -- I have already bought the tickets, but if you still want to go, send me (Nicole) an email.**


Want some holiday cheer? If you know David Sedaris, you know he's hilarious! This play is adapted from an essay broadcast on NPR that launched Sedaris' career, based on his real-life experience getting a job as a Christmas elf at Macy's. It's a pretty dark (and really funny) commentary on Christmas commercialism. You can listen to the original NPR broadcast of SantaLand Diaries. (You need Windows Media Player to stream it).

Meetup details: I'll get the best seats available. The ticket + those outrageous handling fees (PPAC, Amazon) = $36. When you RSVP, please pay online. If I can't get tickets, I will refund your money. Don't wait -- there are still seats left, but I'm sure they will sell out. The deadline to RSVP is 5 pm Oct. 16. If you miss the deadline, but still want to go, send me an email.

The show starts at 8 pm, and we will meet in the lobby of the Sandra Feinstein Gamm Theatre at 7:15 p.m. Look for a small red & white Meetup sign. There is limited parking on the left side of the theatre and on the streets around the back of the theatre.

After the show, we will head up the street to Doherty's East Avenue Irish Pub for food and drinks -- a fun local pub, 342 East Ave, Pawtucket.

More info here.

Play summary:
From award-winning humorist, playwright and National Public Radio contributor David Sedaris ("Me Talk Pretty One Day", "When You Are Engulfed in Flames"), a dose of unconventional holiday humor, adapted from the author's best-selling "Holidays on Ice". A young man arrives in New York with dreams of being a writer for "One Life to Live" and instead lands a part-time job as a Macy's Christmas elf named Crumpet*. From humiliating interview to elf indoctrination to run-ins with miscast Santas, pushy parents and a host of oddball characters, the author's real-life experiences are merrily subversive and fall-on-your-knees funny!

Contains mature language and themes.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for small red & white Meetup sign
item.name: SantaLand Diaries -- Gamm Theatre
